[[inst_hl_lis]]
==== HL.LIS

*Syntax:* hl.lis simm, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load Immediate: loads a 32-bit or 48-bit immediate into register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lis.svg[HL.LIS encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
